new_functions_suggested.description: Implement adaptive authentication with risk-based assessment for user access
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced adaptive authentication for IA-10 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated identity proofing and verification processes for user enrollment
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced identity proofing for IA-12 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Comprehensive device authentication and trust management
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced device authentication for IA-3 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated lifecycle management of authenticators and credentials
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced authenticator management for IA-5 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Validate and monitor service-to-service authentication mechanisms
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced service authentication for IA-9 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated enforcement of re-authentication policies and session management
